description: Verify all nestjs-query resolvers have proper paging argument types configured. Check that @OffsetPaging or @CursorPaging decorators are applied correctly. Ensure GraphQL schema includes paging fields (forward, backward, limit, offset). Test pagination queries for each entity type.
title: Verify GraphQL Pagination Arguments
